briefTitle: Safety, Pharmacokinetics and Efficacy of Dupilumab in Patients ≥6 Months to <6 Years With Moderate-to-Severe Atopic Dermatitis (Liberty AD PRESCHOOL)
officialTitle: A Phase 2/3 Study Investigating the Pharmacokinetics, Safety, and Efficacy of Dupilumab in Patients Aged ≥6 Months to <6 Years With Moderate-to-Severe Atopic Dermatitis

arms.label: Part A (Open label Dupilumab): Age cohorts 1 & 2

summary: This study is a 2-part (parts A and B) phase 2/3 study to evaluate the safety, pharmacokinetics (PK) and efficacy of dupilumab in participants 6 months to less than 6 years of age with moderate-to-severe atopic dermatitis (AD).

primaryOutcome.measure: Part A: Maximum Observed Serum Concentration (Cmax) of Functional Dupilumab

effectByArm.arm: Part A: Cohort 1 (≥2 to <6 Years Old): Dupilumab 3 mg/kg
Part A: Cohort 1 (≥2 to <6 Years Old): Dupilumab 6 mg/kg
Part A: Cohort 2 (≥6 Months to <2 Years): Dupilumab 3 mg/kg
Part A: Cohort 2 (≥6 Months to <2 Years): Dupilumab 6 mg/kg
